task.summary:
Deleted node module files
Created dataclass package and Order / User class
Created MongoDBManager class for manging connections to MongoDB & get DB
Created ObjectToDBObject class for mapping between java class and json
Wrapper class of MongoDBManager class for providing CRUD in order db
Rest Servlet class for checking order status
enabled POJOMapping Feature + just simple test

Renamed to OrderCollectoinUserUUID
url uuid -> useruuid

Created CardImageUpload Servlet
Contans file saving, checking file checksum(md5) operation
